EmailTemplate.name: 2019 Dealer Update #11.2019 Dealer Update #11
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins Update - April 30, 2019
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Sales Bulletins | April 2019
JetWave Discounts
- Honeywell is pleased to announce discounted JetWave pricing through December 31, 2019. Honeywell intends that this discount pricing on our JetWave Tail Mount Antenna system will enable dealers to win more aftermarket JetWave business. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-13 Aspire 200 with HDR for Helicopters.pdf]]>2019-25 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-25 Rev A JetWave MCS 8000 and 8100 for Business Aircraft Dealer Bulletin.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
AeroVue Discount
- Upgrade your MST 67A transponder or Primus II Radio System to ADS-B and get a $50,000 discount on the AeroVue™ Integrated Flight Deck
- Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-13 Aspire 200 with HDR for Helicopters.pdf]]>2019-32 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-32%20Rev -_ MST 70B and Primus II ADSB Dealer Sales Bulletin - AeroVue Discount.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
